file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 34-32-07-04 - VOR/NAV 3 CONTROL PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL VOR/NAV 3 CONTROL PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the VOR/NAV 3 Control Panel. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY VOR/NAV 3 CONTROL PANEL - REMOV- ALL 34-32-07-000-801-A AL VOR/NAV 3 CONTROL PANEL - INSTAL- ALL 34-32-07-400-801-A LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 34-32-07 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-32-07-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. VOR/NAV 3 CONTROL PANEL - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the VOR/NAV 3 Control Panel. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223/224 Cockpit C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the VOR/ILS 3 circuit breaker and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) (Aircraft with VOR/NAV 3 control panel model CTL-23C) On the circuit breaker panel, open the VHF 3 circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. I. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Loosen and remove the three screws (1) which attach the VOR/NAV 3 Control Panel (2) to the main instrument panel or to the control pedestal. (2) Carefully pull the VOR/NAV 3 Control Panel (2) from its housing to get access to the electrical connector (3). (3) Disconnect the electrical connector (3) from the VOR/NAV 3 Control Panel (2). (4) Remove the VOR/NAV 3 Control Panel (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 34-32-07 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

VOR/NAV3 CONTROL PANEL 145AMM340439.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 34-32-07 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL VOR/NAV 3 Control Panel model CTL-32 - Removal/Installation Figure 402 B 1. SCREW (3) A ZONE 223 224 DET. A 2. VOR/NAV 3 CONTROL PANEL 3. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR DET. B 145AMM340435.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 34-32-07 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-32-07-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. VOR/NAV 3 CONTROL PANEL - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the VOR/NAV 3 Control Panel. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-12-00-700-802-A/500 VHF-3 FUNCTIONAL TEST AMM TASK 34-32-00-700-801-A/500 VOR/ILS SYSTEM OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223/224 Cockpit D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Hold the VOR/NAV 3 control panel (2) and connect the electrical connector (3). (2) Put the VOR/NAV 3 Control Panel (2) in its installation position. (3) Install and tighten the three screws (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the VOR/ILS 3 circuit breaker and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 34-32-07 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) (Aircraft with VOR/NAV 3 control panel model CTL-23C) On the circuit breaker panel, close the VHF 3 circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (3) Do the VOR/ILS Functional Test ( AMM TASK 34-32-00-700-801-A/500). (4) (Aircraft with VOR/NAV 3 control panel model CTL-23C) Do the VHF 3 Functional Test ( AMM TASK 23-12-00-700-802-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 34-32-07 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
